showAnvilUses.name: Show anvil uses
showAnvilUses.description: Displays the amount of anvils uses of an item in its tooltip.

discSignalStrength.name: Disc signal strength
discSignalStrength.description: Displays the redstone strength of the disc.

explorerMapCoordinates.name: Show explorer map coordinates
explorerMapCoordinates.description: Displays the coordinates of a explorer map.

foodLevel.name: Show food level
foodLevel.description: Displays the nutrition of a food item in its tooltip.

saturationLevel.name: Show saturation level
saturationLevel.description:
Displays the saturation of a food item in its tooltip.

Current: Displays the level of saturation reached after eating.
Maximum: Displays the maximum possible saturation level of a food.
